data.description: Advanced language practice, including intensive writing and work in pertinent areas of grammar and stylistics.
data.title: ADVANCED LANGUAGE PRACTICE

data.description: An introduction to reading and analyzing literary works, with special emphasis on development of oral and written skills for the discussion of literature. Concentration on methods of analyzing basic literary forms, conventions, genres, and representative short texts in Spanish.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO HISPANIC LITERATURES

data.description: Development of Cervantes as a craftsman and thinker; linguistic and philosophical commentaries on Don Quixote and significant major works.
data.title: CERVANTES

data.description: Intensive practice in reading, writing, and grammar.
data.title: INTERMEDIATE LANGUAGE PRACTICE WITH EMPHASIS ON WRITING AND GRAMMAR

data.description: Introduction to the issues which shape the national cultures and the cultural practices of the Hispanic world. Emphasis on diversity, emergence of new imagined communities, cultural hybridity, and social movements within a historical framework.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO HISPANIC CULTURES
